Text: Is there much difference between this and free edition ??

I tried it, and tested it. There's a lot more in this pro version!
Give it a try, and let me know what u think of it.

Pretty good but I still prefer Diskeeper and Perfect Disk. Thank's

Just remember that most of the time, everyone overuses the defrag tool. Back in the day (Windows 98 and earlier) we had to scream at people to defrag. Now, everyone does it so much that it does little to help and mostly puts unnecessary wear and tear on the HD. If you have an SSD with trim functioning, you should not even need to defrag. 
And yes, I am a fan of the Auslogics products! lol
